data.comment: The match is underway at Neftyanik Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ufa push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Oleg Danchenko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ural Yekaterinburg defence.
Ural Yekaterinburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 5, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ufa.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Ufa Ufa drive forward through Vyacheslav Krotov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ufa drives forward and Catalin Carp gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 12, Andrey Egorychev has recovered and rejoins the match in Ufa.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ufa to check on Andrey Egorychev, who is grimacing with pain.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Vyacheslav Krotov returns to the field for Ufa after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 15, Attention is being given to Ufaâ€™s Vyacheslav Krotov and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Vladimir Moskalev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Ural Yekaterinburg are pushing forward but Eric Bicfalvi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eric Bicfalvi puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 27, Great play from Pogrebnyak Pavel to set up the goal.
Ufa's Komnen Andric has been booked in Ufa.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ufa needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 31, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 34, Ural Yekaterinburg push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Pogrebnyak Pavel gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Ufa defence.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Branko Jovicic (Ural Yekaterinburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Rafal Augustyniak is booked for the away team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Aleksey Gerasimov.
In the minute 37, An attacking Ural Yekaterinburg player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Catalin Carp (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
Eric Bicfalvi nets and Ural Yekaterinburg extend their lead to 0-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 38, Aleksey Evseev (Ural Yekaterinburg) has replaced the possibly injured Aleksey Gerasimov at Neftyanik Stadium.
In Ufa, Ural Yekaterinburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 42, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Ufa.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Ufa's area.
In the minute 45, Ural Yekaterinburg are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Neftyanik Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Ufa.
The home team have replaced Azer Aliev with Dmitri Sysuev. This is the first substitution made today by Rashid Rahimov.
In the minute 46, Rashid Rahimov (Ufa) is making a second substitution, with Vladislav Kamilov replacing Catalin Carp.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Komnen Andric (Ufa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa push upfield but Vladimir Moskalev quickly pulls them for offside.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 53, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Neftyanik Stadium.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 55, Artem Golubev (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Important block from the Ufa defence as Eric Bicfalvi fires in a strike for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 59, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 1-2. Komnen Andric got above everyone else to nod it in.
In the minute 61, Oleg Danchenko with an assist there.
Kirill Folmer is replacing Vyacheslav Krotov for the home team.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Vyacheslav Podberezkin is on a sub for Dmitri Efremov for Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 65, Ufa are coming forward and Konstantin Pliyev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 66, Vladimir Moskalev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 70, Ural Yekaterinburg drive upfield and Denys Kulakov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In Ufa, Yuri Bavin of Ural Yekaterinburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 71, Ufa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Aleksey Evseev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
In the minute 72, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Andrey Egorychev for Ural Yekaterinburg drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Free kick Ufa.
Yuri Bavin (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets a yellow card.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ufa.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 79, Aleksey Nikitin for Ufa has been booked by Vladimir Moskalev and receives a first yellow card.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Eric Bicfalvi has run offside.
In the minute 80, Ufa's Kirill Folmer misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Dmitri Sysuev of Ufa is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Ufa.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Timur Zhamaletdinov is replacing Artem Golubev for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Komnen Andric of Ufa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Ufa.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Eric Bicfalvi is on target but unsuccessful.
Ufa are caught offside.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match has come to a close in Ufa. The final score is 1-2.
Vyacheslav Podberezkin (Ural Yekaterinburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
